alert.note: Alert for East Carteret; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 9:20AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Craven and southwestern Carteret Counties through 1000 AM EDT... At 920 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort Macon State Park, or 9 miles southwest of Harkers Island, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morehead City, Newport, Harkers Island, North River, Straits, Pine Knoll Shores, Harlowe, Wildwood, Bettie, Michael J Smith Airport, Oceana Pier, Cape Lookout Lighthouse, Rachel Carson Estuarine Reserve, Fort Macon State Park, Mitchell Village, Crab Point Village, and Indian Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Carteret; Southern Craven; West Carteret
